name: Alien Puzzle Adventure
synopsis: Alien Puzzle Adventure is a fast-paced, colourful and cartoony puzzle game, combining Match 3 gameplay with a humorous and quirky storyline. The player sets out to save the world from a mysterious chemical attack and armed with Professor Weinstein's Pseudo-quark Generator Gun, the player must neutralise packs of differently-coloured quarks over the course of thirty-five stages, by matching three quarks of the same colour. Can you help stem the tide and save the world?
